attributes.action: Introduce a Cycling licence and  a cycling test.  Please
attributes.additional_details:
The  number of cyclists  getting killed and injured on our roads and pavements seems to be increasing.

We often see  cyclists  ignoring traffic lights and ignoring the Highway Code, endangering themselves  as well as children, pedestrians  and other road users.

Please consider introducing  a  Cycling Licence  followed by a mandatory cycling proficiency test.   Request that the police  prosecute cyclists  for  offences against the Highway  Code, please.
